pkgmetadata.longdescription: Unified Cross-Omics Deconvolution // UNIfied Cross-Omics deconvolution (Unico) deconvolves standard 2-dimensional bulk matrices of samples by features into a 3-dimensional tensors representing samples by features by cell types. Unico stands out as the first principled model-based deconvolution method that is theoretically justified for any heterogeneous genomic data. For more details see Chen and Rahmani et al. (2024) doi:10.1101/2024.01.27.577588.
